column4: Tech triumvirate propels Nasdaq  S&P to record highs
column5: The Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 chalked up record high closes on Friday  propelled by strong results from tech behemoths Google  Amazon and Microsoft. | Video

column4: US STOCKS-Tech triumvirate propels Nasdaq  S&P to record highs
column5: * Indexes ends up: Dow 0.12 pct  S&P 0.23 pct  Nasdaq 0.71 pct   (Updates to close)

column4: US STOCKS-Futures up on tech earnings  Nasdaq to extend record
column5: April 24 U.S. stock index futures rose on Friday as strong results from tech behemoths Google  Amazon and Microsoft set the Nasdaq Composite on track to set a record closing high for the second straight day.

column4: Microsoft profit  revenue beats Wall Street view; shares up
column5: Microsoft Corp on Thursday reported revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations  as sales of its hardware and cloud-computing services helped to offset a decline in the company's core Windows business.

column4: Microsoft coy on cloud profit after Amazon delivers
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/CHICAGO Amazon.com Inc surprised investors on Thursday by disclosing for the first time that it makes a profit from its fast-growing cloud-computing business.

column4: Luxottica sees first pair of glasses with Intel chips in Feb/March
column5: MILAN Italian eyewear group Luxottica expects the first pair of glasses born out of its partnership with U.S. chipmaker Intel Corp to be ready in February or March  co-Chief Executive Massimo Vian told shareholders on Friday.

column4: Luxottica sees first pair of glasses with Intel chips in Feb/March
column5: MILAN  April 24 Italian eyewear group Luxottica  expects the first pair of glasses born out of its partnership with U.S. chipmaker Intel Corp to be ready in February or March  co-Chief Executive Massimo Vian told shareholders on Friday.
